title: Harley-Davidson may make in India to sell globally, says CEO Jochen Zeitz
description: Jochen Zeitz, on his first visit to India after taking over as Harley-Davidson CEO, said the company's immediate priority, however, is to strengthen local sales with the HD X440, the bike Harley co-created with Hero. "We were manufacturing our 750cc also for the international market (here), so I am not ruling that out," Zeitz said, referring to India's export potential for the company.
